## English Words 
> English Words

## Install
```
$ npm install --save english-words
```

## Usage
```javascript
var EnglishWords = require('english-words')

EnglishWords.getWords(function(words){
  console.log(words)
})
```

## API
### .getNames(callback)
```javascript
var EnglishWords = require('english-words')

EnglishWords.getWords(function(words){
  console.log(words)
})
```
